name: OYA
description:
Oya is a puzzle game taking place in a decayed, airborne city.

While on her adventure, Oya will have explore old premises floating up in the air. Thanks to old relics, she'll harness the power to use wind currents in order to modify her surroundings and find the path to the old City.


TEAM
James Van Der Straeten
Hugo Barthouil
João Pereira Lemos Costa
Adrian Jacques
Yohann Bodergat
Paul Sanchez
